storyInfo: In the ducal alliance camp, Siege finds the Victorian soldiers ill-prepared for the drastically different battlefield conditions. Meanwhile, the Nachzehrer King enters the warzone to personally lead his army.

attributes.content: '...The seventh batch of new comms stations has been set up. One-third of all comm lines have been restored.'
'Data from makeshift Catastrophe monitoring stations indicate stabilizing atmospheric Originium concentration, but rising underground Originium activity.
'Two more teams of engineers have arrived at their destination. Continue to eliminate obstacles standing in the way of the main fleet.'
'Four battleships from the Duke of Gododdin, including the Felicis, will arrive at the rendezvous point in fifteen minutes to join the escort flotilla after resupply.'
'Joint Command confirms that Wellington reinforcementsâ€”'
You hear those announcements? The ducal alliance's forward base is just ahead.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Smooth sailing so far.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: We owe Rhodes Island our thanks for plotting our route. And it's not just us who are indebted to them.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Should we drive our tanks straight in? Small encounters are one thing, but this is one of the main camps of the ducal alliance. Will the Exemplars' ID code really work?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Of course. Please leave trifles like these to me and proceed ahead.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Your entrances are always so sudden, Mister Asher. Looks like you've been keeping an eye on our little procession in the middle of everything else you had to do.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: There's a group of soldiers up ahead, Vina! Plus a few trucks of ammo, gear, and food!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Should we just accept it? Could be a trap this berk's laid for us.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Yes... we'll take it.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Ideals alone don't win battles.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Thank you, Mr. Bellingham. Sincerely, this time. You've helped us more than once.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Please, don't call me that. I'm perfectly content being the Strange Man in the Hat. It's for the better if you suspect ulterior motives behind my every move.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: These gifts aren't just for Gibsonham. It's also for everything that Rhodes Island has done. We have sent people to direct civilians to the safe zones.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Gifts? Didn't think you engaged in such courtesies.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Better than not doing anything, isn't it? You know how Victoria works. The towns around Londinium were not part of the Duke of Caster's jurisdiction.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Considering the circumstances, however, Her Grace was forced to take certain actions that might perhaps be controversial in the future, in order to provide safe shelters for as many as possibleâ€”
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Enough, I'm not interested in how Duke Caster intends to win people over.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Tell me where the Stone of the Sword is, and what's happening at the front lines.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: No need to rush, Your Royal Highness. The history of the Stone of the Sword is long and complex...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Ideally, I would require several dozen photographs, an abundance of literature, and have you cleared for the highest access before I could properly recount these stories.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: In any case, I will take you to the front personally. If I were you, I would tell the troops to get some rest at the camp, while they still can.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You will learn more about the situation at the camp. Seeing is worth a thousand words, is it not?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Here, I'll help!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Heave, ho!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: That's the last crate.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Thank you. We were running short on ammo.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The logistics team says they'll whip up a bonnie meal from the supplies ye brought before we head out. Care tae join us for a bite?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Thanks for the offer, but we've got Sarkaz scums to kill.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: We just received orders from Command to join up with the assault on Silverrock Bluffs once we've transferred the supplies.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Those monsters... Nachzehrers, they're called? I can't wait to put them down!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Look at this. The newest crossbows, AP ammo, precision Arts Units. This stuff would be rare even in elite units in ordinary times.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: What about Originium protection? Fighting Sarkaz isn't just about firepower.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: No worries. We've been issued a full set of PPE, plus medication. Look.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: What the...
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Break's over, Private Brown. Get ready to move.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Have you oiled your crossbow?
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: I'll oil it with the blood of Sarkaz. Hope their blood doesn't stink too much.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Good man. Now back to your squad.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Are you the commander of this unit? My name's Shearer. I served as the medical officer on the Duke of Windermere's flagship.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Your soldiers claim they've been issued sufficient Originium PPE, butâ€”
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: What are you trying to say, lieutenant? As far as I know, the Duke of Windermere's troops have withdrawn from the war. It's not your place to question me.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Go back to whatever you're supposed to be doing.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: You know full well, don't you?
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: This type of equipment offers protection against mild industrial pollution at best. And yet you're issuing them to soldiers...
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Soldiers who are about to walk into highly active Originium plume, to face a Catastrophe and Infected Sarkaz head-on!
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: They'll all get infected, and die on the front lines from acute symptoms!
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: On what authority are you speaking to me? As a lieutenant of the so-called Exemplars?
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: I'm questioning you as a citizen of Victoria with a medical education, Major.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Victorian citizen, eh...?
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Then you should know that not even Victoria could produce specialized Originium PPE for a hundred thousand soldiers on such short notice.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: But you should at least tell them the truth!
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: By observing proper operating procedures in highly active Originium environments, their infection rates could be reduced by as much asâ€”
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Spare me the lecture. We came to fight. We came to die.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: But we will take the Sarkaz with us, until victory belongs to Victoria!
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Infected? Oripathy? There will be no confirmed cases of Oripathy in the Victorian Army before the end of the war.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: This is absurd! You'reâ€”
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Me, my commanding officer, and his commanding officer will all be wearing the same protective equipment. We will charge with our men; nay, we'll be leading the charge.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: Now, let go of me.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: If you want to make a difference, Exemplar, go to the front lines.
attributes.name: Victorian Officer

attributes.content: ...Lieutenant Shearer.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You heard him...
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Thanks to advance warning from our Rhodes Island friends, the Exemplars have sufficient protective gear. We even have some to spareâ€”
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Don't even think about it.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: What little we can provide is just a drop in the ocean for the tens of thousands in need.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: All we can do is take care of ourselves. We have our own duty.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: To bring an end to all this, as quickly as we can...
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: It... can't be?!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Captain?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: It's him.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Yer shield... why are ye loadin' your weapon, Captain? Whit're ye daein'?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Wait for me!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What did ye see?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Someone I thought to be long dead.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: What happened to my men?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: They are here. Rest assured, they're only unconscious.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: I don't mean Cello's group.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You know who I mean.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Don't push me, or it won't be my shield against your chin.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: *cough*, *cough* *cough*... If you draw your sword, you'll be assaulting an ally.
attributes.name: Adjutant Hill

attributes.content: Heh. Ally?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: At what point, since the moment we entered County Hillock, have you ever treated us as an ally?!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Answer me!!!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: â€”Lost him.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hill... adjutant to Colonel Hamilton.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I thought he had died in the fires of Dublinn with the Colonel.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Not just him. I saw many familiar faces on the Wellington tanks. They could change their clothes, but I'll never forget their faces.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: County Hillock...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I remember my men, Bagpipe, and how each of them died.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Cello and Oboe died at the hands of Dublinn. Triangle, Snare, Bass, and Mandolin died to 'friendly fire'.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Moments before dying, Triangle asked me, 'who is our enemy?'
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: There isn't a night when I don't think about that question.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Just who is our enemy, Bagpipe?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It's... Dublinn.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Dublinn... Certainly, we could hate the Tarans.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You once told me that you encountered the former 'Leader' of Dublinn, and let her go.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Aye.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I met our enemy too. The Dublinn commander who killed Cello. I buried her by the walls of Londinium with my own hands.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I couldn't stop myself from hating her, but I know she's far from the only one responsible for this tragedy.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Why did our comrades, the most loyal soldiers of Victoria, die at County Hillock, while Hill and more traitors live?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Captain, we...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I know what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If we fire at the duke's tents now, we risk bringing down the alliance... even the dream of the Exemplars.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: That's the saddest thing, isn't it?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We can't even take revenge.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Because they've put on their bloody Victorian uniforms, and once again become our 'allies'.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Captain... permission to speak freely?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Granted.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: ...I don' trust 'em.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Would the men who killed our friends, the ones who fired on innocent civilians, really stand with us when we charge against the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Even we cannae set aside our hatred and trust our lives tae our former enemies wi'oot reservation...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Could they?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: There you are.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina and I inspected this forward base.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The troops are disciplined, and morale is high. The dukes are taking this seriously.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: They seem to have reached a united front, allowing their troops to be organized according to function rather than faction.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: At least, that's what it looks like on the surface.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: We saw Caster's elites standing guard near all the Wellington tents.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: And at least two or three groups of Caster's men stationed further away.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: A faked unity is unity nonetheless.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: At least, in a time of crisis, the dukes know who their true enemy is.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: One more piece of bad news. I checked out the field hospital. It's sparkling clean. There isn't a single wounded inside.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Theyâ€™re abandoning the wounded? That's impossible. Morale would collapse.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Or maybe there are no wounded.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: Also impossible. We saw how fierce the fighting is on our way here. Things could only be worse at Silverrock Bluffsâ€”
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Wait, you don't mean...?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: None of the wounded made it back.
attributes.name: Shearer

attributes.content: We need to put an end to this tragedy as soon as we can.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Exemplars' strength might be insignificant compared to the all-consuming war, but creating miracles, that's what we do.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: An inspiring pep talk. Repairs on your tanks are complete.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: There you are at last.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wait, why's the ground red? It is your blood? Or...?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: That's not important.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: My orders are to ensure that the Sighs of Kings finds its pedestal. Should I fail, another will put on this hat and continue the work.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I bring a message from the Duke of Caster, Your Royal Highness. 'Caster forever honors her commitments.'
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Enough pleasantries. Where is this pedestal, this Stone of the Sword?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You've seen the camp. You have an idea of what the front is like.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is hardly the best time to tell you the truth, but we have no choice.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The pedestal is on the Glorious, flagship of the Duke of Caster.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: ...You planned this all along.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You guided our path, gave us a place to rest, so you could lead us onto your home field.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What's next? Will Caster's troops turn their weapons on us if we say no?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Please, no need to get excited. Facts are facts, no matter how you choose to interpret them.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: My orders were always to bring the Realmblade to the Stone of the Sword, with or without Exemplars.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Please, consider it an act of good faith that I am telling you the truth now, rather than simply taking the sword from you during your darkest hour.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: ...Continue.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Like I said, the history around the sword and the pedestal is a complex one. One that ought to be known only by a selected few royals and nobles.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: In the distant past, even before the Shah of Past and Future, an explorer discovered an artifact deep in the sands in the south of Sargon.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: It was by no means a sword, but it was able to repress the spread of Originium crystals within a certain area
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The treasure allowed the explorer to survive a Catastrophe that should have engulfed the entire team.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The legend of the Catastrophe cleaver...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The survivors forged a sword out of the artifact and presented it to the Shahanshah at the time, as a symbol of valor.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: In the Year 737, the Aslan Padishah Lugalszamszi brought the Sighs of Kings to Victoria.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Decades later, his grandson became Victoria's first Lord of Lions.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The sword has severed the head of a red dragon, witnessed the reconciliation between Aslan and Draco, and became the symbol of Victoria's royal authority.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: It has been damaged and reforged several times, and many have tried to uncover the secret behind its ability to fend off Catastrophe.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Scholars have yet to understand the principles behind the sword's power, but they did discover how to make the most of it.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The pedestal, dubbed Stone of the Sword, at the Mausoleum of Kings is the result of research by House Caster.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The Duke of Caster at the time kept a backup.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: After the original pedestal in the Mausoleum of Kings was destroyed in that battle, the only working replica is kept on the Glorious.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: For a century, Caster has coveted the Realmblade. The chance has finally arrived.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Countless soldiers and civilians will die in the war. But Caster gets to reap the fruit of victory and become the hero who saves Victoria?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Judge it as you will, but this is what little chance, if not the only chance at victory Victoria has in the present crisis.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Our trump card in this dangerous game.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Sugarcoat it all you want, but you can't convince us that the despicable scheming never happened.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The choice is yours, Your Royal Highness.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Enough.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I refuse to engage in arguments over power, while we denounce the dukes for being calculative.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: There is no Princess Alexandrina, only Siege, leader of the Exemplars.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: There is no symbol of royal authority. The Sighs of Kings is just a weapon, one that can win the war for Victoria.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We go to war.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Thank you, on behalf of Victoria.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The spy takes half a step back and bows.
I'll lead the way. However...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You should prepare yourselves.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: 'East vanguard reports retaking three villages by Duskglow River. Sarkaz forces continue to staunchly defend Silverrock Bluffs pass.'
'All resistance on the southern front of the Redmane Mountains has been neutralized, however, Command expressly forbids crossing the mountains to flank the Sarkaz.'
'All gunboats and dreadnoughts in position. Support gunboats have also arrived at their destination.'
The ground continues to tremble. The weary travelers can no longer distinguish the quakes from bombardments or the clusters of Originium erupting from the earth.
The earth is scarred by deep, crisscrossing battleship tread marks. The stench of blood and sludge hangs heavily in the air.
The Exemplars' tanks lumber through the rugged terrain.
We're almost in the hot zone.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: How far until Duke Caster's flagship?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: A moment please. I'm searching for the signal.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Keep heading north, and we'll soonâ€”
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Witchcraft guns!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The lead tank has been destroyed! We've taken damage too.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We can't move. Is it the engine or the wheel?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Possibly both.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Fix it ASAP.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We can't stay here. We need to deliver the Realmblade to the Stone of the Sword.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wait... what's that mountain? I don't recall any mountain like that outside Londinium.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: That's no mountain...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It's Originium.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The churning tides of Originium have coalesced into a colossal mass, blotting out the sun and transforming the very landscape. In its shadow, even battleships appear as mere specks.
Above the mountain of Originiumâ€”
A withered throne ominously hovers.
The Nachzehrer King gazes upon the battlefield.
All seeds sprout at the same time, withered branches creeping towards every death shrouded corner.
Go, my bravest warriors.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: Gnaw upon the greatest bone. Tear iron and steel apart as you would skin and flesh. Rip, tear, consume.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: We shall teach the Victorians: the master of warâ€”
attributes.name: Nezzsalem

attributes.content: Shall master war.
attributes.name: Nezzsalem
